scripts.prepare: yarn set version berry && yarn install && yarn dlx @yarnpkg/sdks vscode
scripts.prepare:user: cd apps/user && yarn set version berry && yarn install
scripts.prepare:office: cd apps/office && yarn set version berry && yarn install
scripts.user:dev: yarn prepare:user && yarn workspace kr-core-gomi-keyword-front-user run dev
scripts.user:dev-build: yarn prepare:user && yarn workspace kr-core-gomi-keyword-front-user run build:dev
scripts.user:dev-preview: yarn prepare:user && yarn workspace kr-core-gomi-keyword-front-user run serve:dev
scripts.user:prod-build: yarn prepare:user && yarn workspace kr-core-gomi-keyword-front-user run build:prod
scripts.user:prod-preview: yarn prepare:user && yarn workspace kr-core-gomi-keyword-front-user run serve:prod
scripts.office:dev: yarn prepare:office && yarn workspace kr-core-gomi-keyword-front-office run dev
scripts.office:dev-build: yarn prepare:office && yarn workspace kr-core-gomi-keyword-front-office run build:dev
scripts.office:prod-build: yarn prepare:office && yarn workspace kr-core-gomi-keyword-front-office run build:prod
scripts.office:dev-preview: yarn prepare:office && yarn workspace kr-core-gomi-keyword-front-office run serve:dev
scripts.office:prod-preview: yarn prepare:office && yarn workspace kr-core-gomi-keyword-front-office run serve:prod
